ygData.subject: Re: Enchant Spells
ygData.msgSnippet: you heard right, that is the only known location so far, though i do have a theory. I have recently found a place called Castle (something)mist. This castle is
ygData.messageBody:
you heard right, that is the only known location so far, though i do have a
theory.
I have recently found a place called Castle (something)mist. This castle is
inhabited only by Dark ELf (Or drow as i like to call them)
I was invisible when i went here, but my theory is that this place might
also sell it :/ I am not sure though.
I did not want to stick around long enough for my inviso to wear off. not
only were there Drow, but Gargoyles as well, and everything conned Red to me
:/ and i am level 10 now. So i wount be going back there anytime soon!

-Aeramus (Bristlebane server)

----- Original Message -----
From: Charles Adams <sirkal@...>
To: <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, April 22, 1999 5:09 PM
Subject: [eqenchanters] Enchant Spells


> From: Charles Adams <sirkal@...>
>
> Hi, I am new to the list.
>
> Can anyone please tell me the locations of the enchant metal spells. I
have
> been told Neriak, but I can't believe that that is the only location.
> Thanks for any help.
> Xezol - Lvl 10 Gnome Mag on E'Ci
>
